5 int NUMBER_OF_CONTROL_POINTS = 8;

7 void visualize_sphere(ros::Publisher& marker_pub, visualization_msgs::Marker& marker, int control_point_number)
8 {
9  // Marker setup
10  marker.header.frame_id = "/control_point" + std::to_string(control_point_number);
11  marker.header.stamp = ros::Time::now();
12  marker.ns = "basic_shapes";
13  marker.id = control_point_number;
14  marker.type = visualization_msgs::Marker::SPHERE;
15  marker.action = visualization_msgs::Marker::ADD;
16  // Position and orientation
17  marker.pose.position.x = 0;
18  marker.pose.position.y = 0;
19  marker.pose.position.z = 0;
20  marker.pose.orientation.x = 0.0;
21  marker.pose.orientation.y = 0.0;
22  marker.pose.orientation.z = 0.0;
23  marker.pose.orientation.w = 1.0;
24 
25  float radius = 0.35;
26 
27  marker.scale.x = radius;
28  marker.scale.y = radius;
29  marker.scale.z = radius;
30 
31  marker.color.r = 1.0f;
32  marker.color.g = 0.0f;
33  marker.color.b = 0.0f;
34  marker.color.a = 0.5;
35 
36  marker.lifetime = ros::Duration();
37 
38  marker_pub.publish(marker);
39 }
40 
41 
42 int main(int argc, char** argv){
43  ros::init(argc, argv, "control_point_visualizer");
44  ros::NodeHandle node;
45 
46  tf::TransformBroadcaster br;
47  tf::Transform transform;
48 
49  ros::Rate rate(50.0);
50 
51  ros::Publisher marker_pub = node.advertise<visualization_msgs::Marker>("visualization_markers", 1);
52  visualization_msgs::Marker marker;
53 
54 
55  while (node.ok())
56  {
57  for (int i = 0; i < NUMBER_OF_CONTROL_POINTS; i++)
58  {
59  visualize_sphere(marker_pub, marker, i);
60  }
61  rate.sleep();
62  }
63  return 0;
